title: The Dirtiest Block
summaries: The Dirtiest Block is a pet-summoning item that summons the Dirtiest Block pet that follows the player around.

It can be found extremely rarely as a block that looks identical to Dirt. Upon world generation, 3 (in a small world), 6 (medium), or 9 (large) Dirt Blocks will randomly be replaced with Dirtiest Blocks.
